detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: Our attorneys serve not only the Bay Area, but the entire state of California. Our team has decades of combined experience.

detailsData.title: Client Focused
detailsData.content: We are committed to helping our clients maximize their benefits while minimizing their risks. We create creative legal solutions fit to your specific needs.

detailsData.title: Diverse Practice
detailsData.content: Infinity Law Group handles a wide range of legal matters, from personal injury and employment law to business law and litigation.

detailsData.title: Proven Track Record
detailsData.content: We have an excellent track record for our clients, providing cost-effective solutions in dispute and litigation matters.

subHeading: Committed to Finding the Best Path Forward
valueProp: Our attorneys are here to help navigate the complexities of legal problems you face. We have the experience and tenacity to achieve the best possible results for our clients.

testimonalData.text: I have used Infinity Law Group for various corporate work and employment issues for my technology company. Both Ashar and Ilya are excellent lawyers.
testimonalData.author: Uzair Sattar, CEO ICE Consulting, Inc.

testimonalData.text: He is always prompt when it comes to returning my calls and emails, friendly, professional and he is very knowledgeable in his areas of expertise!
testimonalData.author: Faina L.

testimonalData.text: You could tell that Ilya is very experienced with accident cases because he predicted every step of the way.
testimonalData.author: Anthony D.
